articles.author: By KEN TYSIAC Associated Press
articles.title: Haula helps Hurricanes earn 3-1 win over Montreal
articles.description: RALEIGH, N.C. (AP) — Erik Haula had a goal and an assist and Charlie Lindgren made 33 saves in his first start of the season, leading the Carolina Hurricanes to a 3-1 win over the Montreal Canadiens on Tuesday night.
articles.content:
RALEIGH, N.C. (AP) Erik Haula had a goal and an assist, leading the Carolina Hurricanes to a 3-1 win over the Montreal Canadiens on Tuesday night.
Sebastian Aho also scored and Teuvo Teravainen had two assists for the Hurricanes (24-14-2), who won their seco… [+1254 chars]

articles.author: By LARRY FLEISHER Associated Press
articles.title: No. 11 Butler blows 23-point lead, survives St. John's 60-58
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Christian David hit a go-ahead 3-pointer with 43 seconds left and No. 11 Butler rallied after blowing a 23-point lead to beat St. John's 60-58 Tuesday night in the Big East opener for both teams.
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) Christian David hit a go-ahead 3-pointer with 43 seconds left and No. 11 Butler rallied after blowing a 23-point lead to beat St. John's 60-58 Tuesday night in the Big East opener for both teams.

articles.author: By JONAH BRONSTEIN Associated Press
articles.title: Killorn scores twice, Lightning come back to beat Sabres 6-4
articles.description: BUFFALO, N.Y. (AP) — Alex Killorn scored two goals, Tyler Johnson had a goal and two assists, and the Tampa Bay Lightning came back from a three-goal deficit to beat the Buffalo Sabres 6-4 on Tuesday night for their fourth…
articles.content:
BUFFALO, N.Y. (AP) Alex Killorn scored two goals, Tyler Johnson had a goal and two assists, and the Tampa Bay Lightning came back from a three-goal deficit to beat the Buffalo Sabres 6-4 on Tuesday night for their fourth straight win.
